sentences.sContent: You should carry your membership card with you at all times.
sentences.sCn: 你应该随身携带会员卡。

sentences.sContent: Membership fees are being increased this year.

synos.tran: 资格；成员资格；会员身分

phrases.pCn: 隶属度（归属函数中的专有名词）；归属程度；会员级别

trans.tranCn: 会员身份； 全体会员
trans.tranOther: when someone is a member of a club, group, or organization
